column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=In order to borrow a book from the library , I will check to be sure I have my library card on me , in my purse .
#id=2
#text=I drive to the local library and park my car .
#id=3
#text=I walk into the library and head to where the books to check out are located .
#id=4
#text=I head over there and start to look for the book I am interested in borrowing .
#id=5
#text=If I am having a problem finding the book , I will go to the information desk and ask for help .
#id=6
#text=Sometimes , it is hard to find for me to find a book on my own in the library , since they have a coding system that is sometimes confusing to me .
#id=7
#text=I either find my book available , or find that it is checked out .
#id=8
#text=If it is available , I get my library card out and head to the check out section of the library .
#id=9
#text=If it is n't available , I will ask as to when it will be .
#text=I leave the library , get in my car and drive home to enjoy my borrowed book .
